com.nitrous.gwt.earth.client.api
Class GEAbstractBalloon

java.lang.Object
  com.google.gwt.core.client.JavaScriptObject
      com.nitrous.gwt.earth.client.api.GEAbstractBalloon
Direct Known Subclasses:
GEFeatureBalloon, GEHtmlBalloon
public class GEAbstractBalloon
extends com.google.gwt.core.client.JavaScriptObject

The base class for the three types of balloon windows that can overlay the 3D window.

Author:
Nick

getCloseButtonEnabled

public final boolean getCloseButtonEnabled()
When true, the balloon frame is displayed with a button that the user can click to close the balloon. When false, the balloon frame is just a plain frame. Default is true.

Returns:
When true, the balloon frame is displayed with a button that the user can click to close the balloon. When false, the balloon frame is just a plain frame. Default is true.

setCloseButtonEnabled

public final void setCloseButtonEnabled(boolean closeButtonEnabled)
When true, the balloon frame is displayed with a button that the user can click to close the balloon. When false, the balloon frame is just a plain frame. Default is true.

Parameters:
closeButtonEnabled - When true, the balloon frame is displayed with a button that the user can click to close the balloon. When false, the balloon frame is just a plain frame. Default is true.
